name: FRigUnit_AimConstraintLocalSpaceOffset
doc:
Orients an item such that its aim axis points towards a global target.
Note: This node operates in global space!

Child: The name of the item to apply aim
bMaintainOffset: Maintains the offset between child and weighted average of parents based on initial transforms
Filter:
Filters the final rotation by axes based on the euler rotation order defined in the node's advanced settings
If flipping is observed, try adjusting the rotation order
AimAxis: Child is rotated so that its AimAxis points to the parents
UpAxis: Child is rotated around the AimAxis so that its UpAxis points to/Aligns with the WorldUp target
WorldUp: Defines how Child should rotate around the AimAxis. This is the aim target for the UpAxis
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
